openings.purpose: Access to villa, adhering to Vastu by aligning with the entrance direction (preferably East)
Provides external view and fresh air; designed to align with Vastu principles for promoting positive energy

eco_features: Rainwater harvesting system integrated into the design
Solar panels installed on the roof of living spaces where applicable
vastu_considerations: Main entrance oriented towards east or north-east for auspicious energy.
Placement of living room to receive natural light during morning hours.
Master bedroom in a calm corner with minimal disturbances.
